name: boosterism
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or act of being very enthusiastic and confident about how good or successful something is or will be, often more than is reasonable: The mayor constantly boasts about the city's cultural richness, but boosterism alone only gets you so far. Many mainstream economists are sceptical about such boosterism.
More examplesFewer examplesThere is occasionally a hint of patriotic boosterism in his writing.This economic boosterism shouldn't blind investors to the very real risks.With its claims to have the tallest building, the biggest theme park, the best golf course, this is the world capital of boosterism.
